title: XRP price makes comeback above $0.50 as pro-XRP lawyer urges former SEC officials’ testimony - FXStreet
content:
XRP price recovered from its decline below the key psychological level of $0.50 early on Saturday.

Pro-XRP attorney John Deaton said that former SEC officials’ testimony in SEC vs Ripple lawsuit could have classified XRP as non-security early on.

Deaton concurred that it is key for Bill Hinman and Jay Clayton to provide testimony in the courtroom.

XRP price started its recovery early on Saturday. The recent consolidation in XRP was a result of the developments in the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) vs. Ripple lawsuit. Following pro-XRP attorney John Deaton’s comments urging former SEC officials’ testimony, the altcoin’s price made a comeback above $0.50.

At the time of writing, XRP price is $0.52 on Binance.

Also read: Top 3 undervalued cryptocurrencies in their opportunity zones during Bitcoin season

XRP price needs to overcome hurdles before rally to $0.70

XRP’s August high is $0.70. The altcoin made a comeback above the key psychological level of $0.50 and is trading at $0.52, at the time of writing. On its path to make a comeback to the August high, XRP price faces hurdles at the 10 and 50-day Exponential Moving Averages (EMAs) at $0.53 and $0.59.

XRP/USDT one-day price chart on Binance

Developments in the SEC vs. Ripple lawsuit have acted as catalysts for the altcoin’s price since the July ruling, where Judge Analisa Torres declared a partial victory for the payment remittance firm. A pro-XRP attorney, John Deaton, recently commented on how former SEC officials, Bill Hinman and Jay Clayton could provide their testimony in the lawsuit and help prove XRP is not a security, early on in the legal battle.

Deaton tweeted:

Hinman definitely gets to testify. Normally, you’d have no chance at being able

to subpoena a former Chairman for a trial. But here, the SEC stupidly chose to bring aiding and abetting charges against the CEO @bgarlinghouse. Ironically, it was Clayton who wanted to sue the… — John E Deaton (@JohnEDeaton1) August 25, 2023

According to Deaton, obtaining testimony from Clayton and Hinman could have saved legal expenses and time spent on the lawsuit. XRP’s adoption would likely have been unaffected during the course of the litigation and an outcome would have been reached faster.

As the XRP holder community awaits the next step in the SEC vs. Ripple lawsuit, the altcoin makes headway in its price recovery.

title: Ripple News: XRP Open Interest Plummets 60% Following Regulatory Progress Since July - Coinpedia Fintech News
content:
Elena is an expert in technical analysis and risk management in cryptocurrency market. She has 10+year experience in writing - accordingly she is avid journalists with a passion towards researching new insights coming into crypto erena.

The ongoing bearish sentiment in the crypto market has led to a 60% decline in XRP’s open interest (OI) since its peak in July when it was valued at $1.19 billion. Unexpectedly, this drop was noted right after the XRP’s gains following Ripple Labs’ court victory against the SEC in July. The downturn is not the only factor pulling the rug for XRP, the SEC’s decision to appeal the ruling has fueled selling activity, and there are concerns that XRP’s price could fall below the crucial level of $0.52.

Let’s analyze the scope of XRP in the beast mode.

Trader’s Losing Interest in XRP?

Due to less interest from the traders, XRP’s open interest (OI) has experienced a significant decline of $725 million. While on-chain data says it’s going downwards drastically. But data comparison from last month shows a peak of $1.19 billion, from here the OI levels have fallen to approx $465 million today, marking a negative growth of 60.92%.

What is the link of OI with XRP Price?

If you look at the charts well, XRP OI represents the total value of derivative contracts linked to XRP’s price movement, including Futures and Options contracts. Based on this the value reflects total investment by market participants in these contracts. A fall from $1.19 billion to $465 million reveals there is a lot of bearish movement traders are selling XRP hastily, which is often interpreted as a lack of confidence in the token’s future price direction.

According to the Coinglass data majority of traders have placed their XRP OI orders on the Binance exchange, with a cumulative value of $128.85 million, and $93.23 million on Bybit. One of the reasons for losing the position is also the fear of Binance going bank run in the near term.

Notably, XRP’s value reached its peak last month at $1.19 billion, a level not seen in recent years since November 2021. During that period, XRP traded around $1.20, which coincided with the peak of the previous bull market. The primary driving force behind this surge was the regulatory lawsuit victory. A U.S. federal court ruling clarified that XRP is not a security, instantly causing XRP’s price to double.

Any Hope for XRP Price?

Although predictions may disappoint XRP enthusiasts, there’s a silver lining. The support levels for the digital asset suggest that any upcoming losses might be small. So, while a drop is expected, it might not be a sudden and significant decline, but rather a gradual decrease.

Currently, bulls and bears are at loggerheads to wage a war to trigger the next move. As of writing, XRP price trades at $0.523, surging over 1.7% in the last 24 hours.

title: Elonator’s Community-Driven Model: A Shift Beyond PayPal Stable Coin & XRP in Crypto Payments - Tekedia
content:
PayPal’s announcement lifted its shares by 2.66% on Monday, reflecting confidence in the troubled crypto market. Elonator’s (ETOR) development and its distinct community-driven, passive revenue model can potentially change the landscape of crypto payment systems.

In this article, let’s ponder on Elonator with PayPal’s stable coin PayPal USD (PYUSD) and Ripple’s native token (XRP), emphasizing its creative approach and outlining how it may foster wider crypto acceptance.

<< Click Here To Learn More About Elonator Presale >>

PayPal Rolls Out Its Stablecoins

PayPal introduced a US dollar stablecoin on August 7, 2023, becoming the first major financial technology corporation to accept digital currencies for payments and transfers. PayPal USD (PYUSD) is a payment system backed by extremely liquid and secure assets. While stablecoins have been available for years, they are yet to make inroads into the mainstream consumer payments sector.

You may exchange your PYUSD for US dollars whenever you want, and that’s not all. It may be used to obtain other cryptocurrencies from PayPal’s portfolio, such as Bitcoin. PYUSD is more than simply a token; it’s the beginning of a new era of dollars on the blockchain network. This isn’t simply a milestone for PayPal and Paxos, according to Paxos on the X messaging network; it’s “like dropping a beat that’ll get the entire financial industry grooving.”

Quick Transactions With XRP

Ripple is a blockchain-based digital payment network and protocol, as well as the creator of its cryptocurrency, XRP. Rather than using blockchain mining, Ripple confirms transactions using a consensus method via a consortium of bank-owned computers. It securely and rapidly transfers payments across borders at a minimal cost. It acts as a bridge currency, allowing financial institutions to convert both crypto and fiat currencies at a lower cost.

In response to Bitcoin technology, Ripple Labs, a technology firm located in the United States, built Ripple’s blockchain architecture in 2012. The resultant payment network, RippleNet, was created to give banks a quicker, more cost-effective, and simplified option for completing cross-border transactions. RippleNet isn’t just the main event; it’s also the brain behind the XRP Ledger (XRPL), a genius system for settling real-time transactions and a snazzy currency exchange and remittance network.

Now Trace Transactions With Etor Tokens

The Elonator Token is ready to take over the top crypto community. It is a wild fusion of Elon Musk’s cutting-edge intelligence with the Terminator’s uncompromising force from The Terminator movies. This game-changer is more than simply a token; it represents a completely new way of pondering about memes and money.

Elonator is a top crypto community-focused initiative that has been built and developed to empower as many people as possible..

<< Buy Into The Elonator Presale >>

It provides genuine value to investors by preserving openness and accessibility, allowing anybody to evaluate and verify the actions. Anyone having an ETOR contract address may simply trace transaction flows using the Ethereum blockchain explorer. Participating is made easy by holding the ETOR token (1 ETOR = 1 Vote). A liquidity lock is also implemented to maintain the stability and security of the ETOR token’s price and to avoid significant price volatility protecting the tokens.

It’s Time To Become An Elonator Presale Investor

PayPal rocks the boat with its Paypal stable coin PYUSD, a game-changer in the making. Ripple’s no stranger to the party either. With its XRP magic, it’s speeding up cross-border payments.

But the Elonator token is all set to mesmerize on the stage with its redefined crypto payments and transactions. It’s not just a token; it’s a new way of thinking.

Now is the time to invest in the Elonator presale and win exciting prizes.
